column5: After some crappy driving conditions we met up with jeffw in minden and headed to a small lake up hwy35. Jeff caught 2 nice splake about 16" and my buddy caught another, on spoons tipped with minnows. Personally I have a new white stripe on the back of my floater suit. Lots of hits throughout the day, last few trips out seems that noon is the active time. Despite the snow it was a great day to be out.
Great report , Bud. That is one beauty...did you keep that one?
Ya we kept a couple for the bbq. amazing red flesh on them
Nice fish.  Hmmm, maybe a winter trip to the cottage in Minden is in order  Joey
Very nice colours on that fish. Looks more like a brookie than a splake.  Thanks for the report.
